com.ibm.ecm.api.coresdk.model

Interface IBMECMFavorite

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Comparable<IBMECMBaseObject>, IBMECMBaseObject, Serializable

    public interface IBMECMFavorite
extends IBMECMBaseObject
    Represents a favorite item in IBM Content Navigator. A favorite provides a quick way to access an item such as IBMECMContentItem or IBMECMTeamspace. Favorites are stored as a global list on a IBMECMDesktop. Clients can present this list to users to give them access to their favorite items.

    A favorite item contains its own id and name, but it also contains a link getItemId() back to the original item by means of a stored id. Callers can use that id and perform a retrieval or call the load(IBMECMCompletionHandler) method to obtain a direct reference.

    • Method Detail

      • getItemId

        String getItemId()
        Returns the id of the item associated with this favorite. This is the item that this favorite is providing quick access to.
        Returns:
        the id of the item associated with this favorite

      • getVsId

        String getVsId()
        Returns the version series id of the item associated with this favorite.
        Returns:
        the version series id of the item associated with this favorite

        Returns the id of the repository registered for the sync server.
        Returns:

      • isSyncEnabled

        boolean isSyncEnabled()
        Returns whether the item associated with this favorite is enabled for sync.
        Returns:
        true if the item associated with this favorite is enabled for sync
        See Also:
        IBMECMItem.enableSync(IBMECMCompletionHandler)

      • getItem

        IBMECMItem getItem()
        Returns the item associated with this favorite. This will return null until load(IBMECMCompletionHandler) is called.
        Returns:
        the item associated with this favorite

      • setItem

        void setItem(IBMECMItem item)
        Sets the item associated with this favorite.
        Parameters:
        item - the item associated with this favorite

      • getSyncId

        int getSyncId()
        Returns the id of the sync item if the item associated with this favorite has been enabled for sync. This will return null if isSyncEnabled() is false.
        Returns:
        the id of the sync item if the item associated with this favorite has been enabled for sync

      • getClassId

        String getClassId()
        Returns the id of the IBMECMContentClass instance. This content class is based on the item associated with this favorite.
        Returns:
        the id of the IBMECMContentClass instance for the item associated with this favorite

      • getSubType

        String getSubType()
        Returns the subtype of this favorite.
        Returns:
        the subtype of this favorite

        IBMECMRepository getRepository()

      • remove

        void remove(IBMECMCompletionHandler<Boolean> onComplete)
        Removes this favorite item.
        Parameters:
        onComplete - the completion callback that returns true if the favorite item is removed

      • load

        void load(IBMECMCompletionHandler<IBMECMItem> onComplete)
        Loads the item associated with this favorite and returns a reference to it. The loaded item is the item that this favorite item is accessing.
        Parameters:
        onComplete - the completion callback that returns the item associated with this favorite if the call is successful

        IBMECMObjectType getFavoriteType()
        Returns the type of this favorite.
        Returns:
        the IBMECMObjectType type of this favorite
